name: Eury Perez Beltre
title: Mobile Developer
bio:
I'm a mobile developer passionate of building exciting things, always looking to improve myself and reach newer levels each time. Software development has been my day to day for the last 7+ years. I have been running an interesting career which I have learned a lot about how to do the things in. I work for X-Team as a Senior Android Developer.

I love the nature and take advantage of my family roots coming from a small town so I go visit my family multiple times every year to enjoy the rivers, mountains, that perfect weather and the very welcoming and heartwarming people.

I enjoy the music and sharing with my friends (I make great jokes tho). I also have an obsession of increasing my family's life quality, I'm in the quest of and almost everything in my life go around that.
